runs.comm: cuts in to the off and middle line, tucked to backward square-leg
full in length outside off and Hafeez times his punchy on-the-up drive through covers.
gets forward to defend it to the off side of the pitch
short in length outside off, pushed out to point
pushes this towards mid-on for a quick single and there is a direct hit at the non-striker's  from Russell but the batsman is home
full in length outside off stump, squirted out to point.
a bouncer and it flies past the attempted pull and climbs over the left shoulder
full in length, straightening on the off stump line, Shehzad is almost squared-up but manages to hold some semblance of a balance to jab that one away
pushes this length delivery to mid-on
full in length, on the middle and off line, tapped close on the leg side for a single
a slightly short of length delivery and Hafeez goes for the pull shot but finds the man at deep backward square-leg! Sammy gets a wicket in his first over
on a length around the off stump line, defended to the off side
gets across to play a nicely-timed punchy drive through covers to collect his first boundary
full in length, on the off stump line, defended on the front foot
in the channel outside off, left alone
full in length, just outside off, pushed out to right of Nurse at  cover
full delivery on the middle and Shehzad picks it nicely over mid-on. A whippy wristy shot that
Crunchy! The short-pitched delivery this time and Shehzad laps it around the corner. It wasn't the fierce pull but he placed it nicely, sort of helped it along
gets forward to tap the length delivery towards point for a single
full delivery and the batsman is caught on the back foot. Too full to do that and he manages to stab it to the leg side
comes down the track and tries to heave the short-of-length delivery to the leg side but ends up mistiming it awfully to mid-on. A simple dolly of a catch. Done in by the extra bounce
gets back to tuck this wide of midwicket
full in length, on the middle stump line, stabbed to the off
the lifter outside off, he tries to pull it but doesn't connect
clips this past square-leg for a single
full in length, flicks it uppishly over midwicket but it falls short of the fielders in the deep
shortish delivery, pulled away for a single
slower, full in length just outside off stump, defended on the front foot

almost caught by the keeper. This one straightend off a length outside off and Umar Akmal partly edged it, partly steered it and the part-time keeper Fletcher was late to react. he was first moving to his left before he lunged out to his right but couldn't get there in time.
runs this to wide third man for a single
Tonked! Slapped! It was the short delivery and Shafiq pulled it over midwicket boundary
shuffles across to clip this one from the middle stump line to deep backward square-leg fielder
Shot! he pressed back and punched a short-of-length delivery through cover point. Fab timing.
fullish outside off stump, sliced away for a "catch"  at backward point
short of length delivery and Shafiq pulls it to square-leg boundary. Bishoo ran after it but as he tried to slide and push the ball back in, his foot touched the rope
stands tall to punch this shortish delivery to cover
fullish delivery, pushed past the bowler for a single
leans forward to push the slower one to cover
backs away to punch this from the off stump line to extra cover
fetches it from outside off and paddles it to fine-leg region
shortish leg break, mistimed to short extra cover

Very fine catch from hyatt! It was a nice leg break, full in length and turning, Shafiq got a leading edge on the attempted defensive push to right of midwicket. The ball lobbed towards short midwicket and Hyatt rushed in and dived fully forward to take a very good catch

slightly short outside off, pulled away to long-on. hold on Some drama Appeal for hit wicket! They have gone to the third umpire. Well, replays reveal Misbah has dislodged the stumps after he completed the shot. Misbah went right back to play that forcing shot. The back leg went behind the stumps on the leg side. And as he tried to hold his balance after he completed the shot and tried to step forward for the single, his foot dislodged the bails. Misbah keeps finding new ways to get out, doesn't he?
gets back to punch it to mid-off
leans forward to drive through covers
full in length and outside off, driven to long-off
walks forward and across the stumps, and drives this to long-off
slower one, full and well outside off, Afridi waited for it and lofted it between long-off and sweeper cover
gets forward to drive to long-on for a single
steers this to third man for a single
gets down the track but doesn't reach the pitch of the ball and adjusts to defend
slightly short in length ,cut away to deep point region
really full delivery, almost yorker length, Umar edges the attempted big hit to his pad
too full to cut but he tries and ends up pushing it to point
takes a step down the track but yorks himself in the process. The ball rolls back down the track
skids on from short of length, around off, forced away to long-on
full in length, around off, Afridi jabs it away at the last minute
he loves to cut. This one too was so full but he crouches to cut it to deep point
And now Bishoo runs from short third man but can't reach the third man boundary in time to cut the ball. Umar Akmal played a nice little reverse sweep
gets back to punch this to the bowler
low full toss, on the middle, eased to long-on
full around off stump line, driven to long-off
leans forward to tuck this behind square-leg
forces this away to deep cover
plays the paddle scoop to collect two runs
around the leg stump line, swept away for a single
moves outside leg and cuts to right of sweeper cover
slasher! He moved outside leg stump and sliced this very full delivery to the point boundary.
Sammy takes a stinging catch! Afridi moved outside leg and blasted a full-length delivery to extra cover. Sammy leaped to take a good catch. Who will support Umar?
slower cutter, tapped to short third man for a single
full in length, flicked away behind square-leg for a single
slower off cutter, on the middle, defended on the front foot
tries the short ball and again pays for it. Umar loves to cut but he also loves to pull. He crunched this to midwicket boundary

full delivery outside off stump, umar tries to square drive it and misses. He almost over balances outside the crease. The back foot was dragged a bit, but never raised, and it stayed inside the crease
works this to midwicket region for a single
backs away from the stumps and punches the off break from the line of the middle and leg to sweeper cover!
outside off stump, steered to left of Bishoo at short third man
full, very full, around off and Umar again stays back  and squeezes it to backward point for a quick single. Ravi Rampaul with the throw but it isnt accurate
gets back to steer this to Ravi at backward point
full delivery on the middle and leg, nurdled around the corner
again prefers to stay back to a full delivery and cuts to sweeper cover
full delivery on the middle stump line, pushed out to mid-on
yorker length again, jabbed back down the track. Two good deliveries so far. He has the tendency to go for a bouncer now and then. Lets see what he bowls next
he keeps this full, not quite yorker length but full, Umar goes for the slog over midwicket and edges to his pad
goes for the yorker length delivery again, ends up as a low dipping full delivery, eased to long-on
overpitched delivery this time, driven to right of deep cover

Salman is run out! And Sammy is the man with the direct hit! It was driven to extra cover where Sammy swooped on the ball and fired a direct hit at the non-striker's end. The third umpire first presses the 'not out' button! And Sammy can't believe it. The on-field umpire then gives it out before 'Out" flashes on the big screen! Wicked fun!

The bowler slipped and fell after release. And Salman then had to try and run around him, turn to the left to take a detour and that cost him his wicket
full delivery on the middle, flicked away for a single
mistimes the pull through midwicket for couple of runs
rushes down the track and smashes it over the bowler and to the sightscreen. smashing strike
cut to backward point where Barnwell makes a mess of a regulation stop. Had he collected, he could have had a run out
works this through midwicket for a single
full delivery, squirted out to backward point
full in length around off, square driven to deep point region
slower cutter around off, run down to third man
short in length, pulls it to long-on for a single
clears his front foot and heaves the short delivery to deep midwicket for a single

gets right across the stumps and tries to paddle scoop this delivery but misses. And he walks to the square-leg umpire and says there are only three men inside the ring! The square-leg ump now gets on the walkie talkie. And now gives it a no-ball

Since the previous no ball wasn't a front-foot no ball, this one is not a free hit. Umar Akmal goes for the big pull shot to a short delivery but doesn't clear deep midwicket. Umar hangs around for a while; was he expecting it to be a free hit? anyway, he has to go. A game-breaking blow?
in the zone outside off, beaten on the attempted cut
slashes this one to third man for a single
Bishooooo! He has taken out the middle stump. Rehman went down the track and tried to heave it over midwicket but made no contact. Clatter! Wicket no 4!
flighted slowly around off, squeezed out to backward point
the front-of-the-hand release this time and the ball skids on straight after pitching, jabbed away to the leg side
the slower leg break this time, swept for a single
full delivery around middle and leg, swept to short fine-leg fielder
quickish slider, punched down to long-on
tries to pull this but mistimes it to midwicket
full delivery outside off, lifted in the air to wide long-off region, the sub Roach moves to his left
on the middle and swiped away to the cow corner for couple of runs
low full toss, on the middle, driven to Roach at long-off
lofts this in the air and this too falls safely .. this one drops to the left of long-on
moves outside leg, Nurse follows him with a full delivery, swept away to deep backward square-leg
full and on the off stump line, slashed away to deep cover

moves outside leg and has a slog. The ball lobs between Sammy at cover and Bishoo at backward point. Sammy thought Bishoo will take it but Bishoo left it for his captain. Sammy adjusted at the end and lunged to his left to take it. And he has a chat with Bishoo before patting him on the back in the end!
slashed away to backward point boundary where Barnwell makes a diving stop
full length delivery, driven to extra cover where Sammy gets an awkward bounce! It not only bounced but also spun away from Sammy!
Four more! Ajmal blasts this over extra cover. He is still gunning after the target. 11 runs so far in this over
shuffles to the off and tries to paddle scoop and edges it to backward square-leg region
moves outside leg stump and drives to deep cover. The throw comes to Rampaul who doesn't collect it cleanly. Overthrows!
Wide! the batsman shuffles across to try to paddle sweep and Russell fires it down the leg side. Sammy gets across for another chat
full and straight this time, driven to long-off for  a single
a sharp bouncer on the middle stump line and the surprised batsman just sways away from the line of fire!
low full toss - was it around waist high or over it? - on the middle, swatted to midwicket for a single.
very full delivery, just a single as Ajmal pushes it to extra cover
slips in the slower one outside off and Junaid is beaten by the lack of pace. ajmal calls him for a single, a bye, though the keeper collected it cleanly and tried to throw down
Russell roars. And a joyous Sammy hugs him. Full delivery, driven to long-off for just a single. West Indies have won by 7 runs!
